messages.subject: yr end assessment
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, This is my first year of hsing my 8 yo son, James. I live in New York. If there is anyone who lives in NY or has regs similar to NY, could you please
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
This is my first year of hsing my 8 yo son, James. I live in New York.
If there is anyone who lives in NY or has regs similar to NY, could you
please give me an idea of what type of format you use for your qtrly
reports and yr end written narrative. I started out trying to duplicate
school, which made qtrlies easier. I have found that unschooling is the
best route for us, but now I am a little confused as to how to document
and report. Any suggestions would be appreciated. Thanks
--
Janice Odynsky
"The mother's heart is the child's schoolroom"....Henry Ward Beecher
"There are no lazy, withdrawn, aggressive, or angry children, only
children denied to learn in a way that is natural to them." ...Paul E.
Dennison,PhD.
